alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 12:49PM MST until August 10 at 2:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 1249 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms produced between 1 and 2 inches of rain just to the north and east of Pine Lake and Hualapai Mountain Park before noon. Rainfall has since diminished over the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing over the north and northeast portions of Hualapai Mountain which drain across DW Ranch and Blake Ranch roads. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Dw Ranch Road and Blake Ranch Road. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
